statements: SELECT * FROM UrbanDevelopmentProjects;
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM UrbanDevelopmentProjects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM UrbanDevelopmentProjects WHERE project_location = 'New York';
SELECT project_description FROM UrbanDevelopmentProjects WHERE project_name LIKE 'Residential%';
SELECT * FROM UrbanDevelopmentProjects ORDER BY project_location DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM UrbanDevelopmentProjects WHERE project_location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY project_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM UrbanDevelopmentProjects WHERE project_name LIKE 'Renovation%' ORDER BY project_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM UrbanDevelopmentProjects WHERE ST_DISTANCE(project_location, 'POINT(37.7749 -122.4194)') < 1000

SELECT project_name, project_location FROM UrbanDevelopmentProjects WHERE ST_WITHIN(project_location, 'POLYGON((37.7749 -122.4194, 37.7749 -122.40, 37.789 -122.40, 37.789 -122.4194, 37.7749 -122.4194))')
SELECT * FROM UrbanDevelopmentProjects WHERE ST_CONTAINS('POLYGON((37.7749 -122.4194, 37.7749 -122.40, 37.789 -122.40, 37.789 -122.4194, 37.7749 -122.4194))', project_location)
SELECT * FROM land_use;
SELECT id, area_name, land_type, land_area FROM land_use ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT location_name, infrastructure_type FROM infrastructure WHERE construction_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, area_name FROM land_use WHERE land_type = 'residential' ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM infrastructure WHERE infrastructure_type LIKE '%road%';
SELECT id, area_name, land_type, land_area FROM land_use WHERE land_type='Residential' ORDER BY area_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_name, infrastructure_type, DATE_FORMAT(construction_date, '%d-%m-%Y') AS formatted_date FROM infrastructure ORDER BY construction_date ASC;
SELECT id, area_name, land_type, ROUND(land_area) AS rounded_area FROM land_use WHERE land_area > 1000 ORDER BY rounded_area DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT area_name, COUNT(*) AS num_of_properties FROM land_use GROUP BY area_name HAVING num_of_properties > 2 ORDER BY num_of_properties DESC;
SELECT infrastructure_type, COUNT(*) AS num_of_infrastructure FROM infrastructure GROUP BY infrastructure_type ORDER BY num_of_infrastructure DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, location, land_use FROM geospatial_data WHERE land_use = 'residential';
SELECT project_name, start_date, budget FROM urban_development WHERE budget > 100000;
SELECT * FROM land_use_types WHERE description LIKE '%agricultural%';
SELECT id, land_use_type FROM land_use_types ORDER BY land_use_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data WHERE id = 10
SELECT project_name, budget FROM urban_development ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT location, infrastructure FROM geospatial_data WHERE land_use = 'Residential'
SELECT id, land_use_type FROM land_use_types WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data WHERE location IS NOT NULL AND infrastructure = 'Road'
SELECT * FROM land_use;
SELECT area_name, land_type FROM land_use WHERE land_area > 1000;
SELECT infrastructure_name, location FROM infrastructure WHERE infrastructure_type = 'Road';
SELECT project_name, developer_name FROM urban_development ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT stage_name, completion_date FROM development_progress WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM land_use ORDER BY area_name ASC, land_area DESC;
SELECT infrastructure_name, location FROM infrastructure WHERE infrastructure_type = 'Road';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM urban_development WHERE developer_name = 'ABC Developers' AND start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT land_type, COUNT(*) AS total_land_types FROM land_use GROUP BY land_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT dp.project_id, ud.project_name, dp.stage_name, dp.completion_date FROM development_progress dp JOIN urban_development ud ON dp.project_id = ud.project_id WHERE dp.stage_name LIKE '%Complete%';
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data;
SELECT project_name, start_date, completion_date FROM urban_projects;
SELECT land_area, land_use_type, project_id FROM land_use_analysis ORDER BY land_area DESC;
SELECT infrastructure_id, infrastructure_type, location, installation_date FROM infrastructure_data WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, land_use_type, completion_status FROM development_history WHERE completion_status = true ORDER BY project_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM urban_projects ORDER BY project_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT land_use_type FROM land_use_analysis;
SELECT infrastructure_type, installation_date FROM infrastructure_data WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date, completion_date FROM urban_projects WHERE start_date < '2021-06-01' AND completion_date > '2021-12-31';
SELECT project_name, start_date, completion_date FROM urban_projects WHERE project_name LIKE 'P%' AND completion_date IS NULL;
